lines: Ku mnand’ ukwethemb’ uJesu, Nokukholw’ izwi lAkhe;
Yen’ uJesu ngi yamthemba, Se ngi mhlolile mina;
Jesu! Jesu! Gugu lami, Ngomsa ngi themba Wena.
Wo! Ku mnandi ukuthemba Ukwethemba igazi;
Ye, ku mnandi ukumthemba Ukushiya izono;
Ngi funde ukukwethemba, Jesu, Msindisi wami;
Ngi y’azi u nami Wena, Kuze kube nanini.
